reference.title: lcInstructornote
reference.shortdesc: The <lcInstructornote> was deprecated in DITA version 1.3. It was replaced with the <lcInstructornote2> element. It was originally intended to provide information or notes you want to provide to the course instructor. These notes can be conditionalized out of content you intend to deliver to the learner.

section.title: Contains
section.p: The content model of this element may differ based on where it is used. Content model information is located here:

section.title: Contained By
section.p: The parents of this element may differ based on where it is used. Content model information is located here:

example.title: Example
example.codeblock:
Introduction

If you need an introduction, you would include it here.

You can have notes, tables, all kinds of things like that here, if you desire. You can provide tips for instructors in an instructor note, like this one.
